/* mngrCodeSwapTarget */
SELECT A.C_CODE, A.C_NAME, A.C_PCODE, A.C_DEPTH, A.C_ORDER, A.C_AUTH, A.ETC1, A.ETC2, CAST(A.REGDT as DATE ) AS REGDT, CAST(A.UPDDT as DATE ) AS UPDDT, CAST(A.DELDT as DATE ) AS DELDT, A.REGMEMID, A.UPDMEMID, A.DELMEMID, A.DEFAULTYN, A.DELYN, A.EXP1, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_CODE WHERE C_PCODE = A.C_CODE AND DELYN = 'N') SUBTREE FROM T_CODE A WHERE A.DELYN = 'N'
AND C_ORDER < (SELECT C_ORDER FROM T_CODE WHERE C_CODE= #{schCode} AND C_PCODE = A.C_PCODE AND DELYN = 'N') ORDER BY C_ORDER DESC
AND C_ORDER > (SELECT C_ORDER FROM T_CODE WHERE C_CODE= #{schCode} AND C_PCODE = A.C_PCODE AND DELYN = 'N') ORDER BY C_ORDER ASC
